methods: abstract void getOutline(View view, Outline outline) Called to get the provider to populate the Outline.

fields: public static final ViewOutlineProvider BACKGROUND Default outline provider for Views, which queries the Outline from the View's background, or generates a 0 alpha, rectangular Outline the size of the View if a background isn't present.
public static final ViewOutlineProvider BOUNDS Maintains the outline of the View to match its rectangular bounds, at 1.0f alpha.
public static final ViewOutlineProvider PADDED_BOUNDS Maintains the outline of the View to match its rectangular padded bounds, at 1.0f alpha.
